H0.text: What bridge connects the two peninsulas of Michigan. Mackinac Bridge

H1.text: What bridge connects the two peninsulas of Michigan. Detroit River Bridge

H2.text: What bridge connects the two peninsulas of Michigan. Soo Locks Bridge

H3.text: What bridge connects the two peninsulas of Michigan. Dalmac

A4.text: The Mackinac Bridge connects the Upper and Lower peninsulas of the U.S. state of Michigan.

A5.text: The state of Michigan initiated an automobile ferry service between Mackinaw City and St. Ignace in 1923; it eventually operated nine ferry boats that would carry as many as 9,000 vehicles per day.
